divs: Sighting Detailsmy litle sister about 11 yrs her friend about 13 and my girlfriend and i were riding home from a weddeing on a real rainy night we witnessed a triangular shaped ufo come out of the clouds and fly straight down the road in front of us as i was driving it was just spectacular.it just fly straight ahead and went back up in the cloads in was'nt going all that fast maybe 100 to 200 mph it left us all with are mouth open this was march 15th 1985 maybe march 17 i can find out for sure wonder was any other report made at that time.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Alexandria
There were no other sightings in Alexandria on or around March 15th 1985
Summary: a very uniqe craft droped out of the clouds and flew in front of us
